short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your students in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For tutors --- keep track of your individual students with quick notes.

**Now version 2**
*You can now adjust the size of text boxes
*You can hide/show previous classes by clicking the class title


Uses HTML5 LocalStorage.
